tests.name: All Unit Tests Pass
tests.run: cd ./src; pwd; python3 -m unittest discover -v && echo "All Unit Tests Passed."

tests.name: Check All TODO Comments Removed
tests.run: pwd; echo "Searching for TODOs ..."; grep -r "\"\"\"TODO:" "$(pwd)/src" > TODOs.grep.txt; cat ./TODOs.grep.txt && rm ./TODOs.grep.txt
